reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and full of sparkle, with high-quality construction and comfort that's not too itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Glamour
items.body: It’s always fun to play “dress-ups” and be sparkly in sequins when the opportunity arises. The quality of this dress is like what one would expect from a dress shop; not a costume store. Classy and well-sewn. It is completely lined so my fat grandma arms didn’t show through the sheer, sparkly sleeves. It is also stretchy so it was comfortable and easy to move in. This is a 2X. I’m in my 60’s, weigh about 230, and 5’4” tall. The length was perfect for my height. Just above the knee. Plenty of room in the bust, and swishy on the hips. Good luck and have fun dressing to the nines! Read more
items.author: P. S. Butterweck

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good return policy
items.body: Didn’t fit as expected, I returned. Great easy return policy and was no hassle - while it didn’t fit my body style it was a really nice dress!! Read more
items.author: T

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Black, JUST like the DESCRIPTION
items.body: Super cute! Black and gold, just like it says... yes, the pic looks very navy. The sash is not attached and awkwardly slips down but the dress looks cute without it. It IS backless but I have a smooth front closure bra that looks great underneath. I'm 5ft 7in, 180 lbs 40DD and the 1X fits very comfortably (I typically wear a size 12 dress). Length skims just above my knee which I think is long enough "for my age". Sexy, modest and flattering all in one. I was pleasantly surprised to find the sleeves are lined so you can wear this to winter parties without freezing! It looks sheer in the pic but is lined top and bottom and pretty nice quality for the price. Read more
items.author: Mixee Bee

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Snagging
items.body: The sequins catch on each other when worn and move around. Snagging continuously. Sad because it’s a beautiful dress. Read more
items.author: Eric Fischesser

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, flowy dress!
items.body: I absolutely LOVE this dress! I am 5'3" and 156 lbs, and it fits perfectly! It is not itchy, or heavy because it has a silky lining. The ribbon belt is not attached, so you can use it, or not, or use a different belt of your choice. Flowy, stretchy and beautiful! Read more
items.author: April R.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars All pieces didn’t come
items.body: Did not come with the black belt in picture I honestly don’t know if the belt will make that much of A difference but without it it forsure does not look well Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made & beautiful fit!
items.body: This dress is so comfortable and very well made. I love the clasp at the bust for modesty (if desired). It's flowing and so sparkly! It's got a bit of stretch which is nice and fit like a glove. I'm 5'3" and about 160 lbs with a DDD bust. Great value for the money! Love it! Read more
items.author: Heather Dickerson

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: The dress is pretty but the sequins get caught on everything and break easily and I only just tried it on. Also in the description they say: “Long sleeves, comes with matching waist ties. With pockets.” But it does not come with a waist tie nor does it have pockets do they should update the description and not be deceptive. Not worth the price so I will likely return. Read more
items.author: Ren

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Cocktail Evening Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Cocktail Evening Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Black, Black Gold, Black Silver. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
